document.title: Nebraska Department of Education AQuESTT Evidence-Based Analysis Standards

6256953E65CB499DA9A5B7DDCDD5BBF3.description:
The school district technology infrastructure meets the teaching
and learning needs of faculty and staff.

50553E5220684959A8A504923E9EA457.description:
The school district develops an annual professional learning
plan that supports continuous improvement.

FE7360C7091F47C0BC5385401EC9BA53.description:
The school district utilizes a formal staff evaluation process
aligned to the Nebraska Evaluation Model for Teachers and
Principals.

A084589AD4254923AADCCCABBA87F1CA.description:
The school district utilizes a research-based instructional model
aligned to the Nebraska Teacher and Principal Performance
Framework (NTPPF).

D22071615238493190DCDEA0FF4FDE43.description:
The school district utilizes data-informed strategies for
measuring and addressing teacher engagement.

F933273E6A67477F88956B86BCC4095E.description:
EDUCATOR EFFECTIVENESS--Â identify which response option best describes the
policies, practices, and procedures in your school or district, in relation to Educator Effectiveness.

A895D6405C98438FB79A05FF00E26096.description:
The school district utilizes perceptual data about the thoughts of
stakeholders (e.g., opinions, views, beliefs, convictions,
sentiments) to inform and adjust practices, policies, and
procedures

295F3532E60744159D6EA5CEB8961067.description:
Written standards-driven grading policies are shared with
students and parents.

20A31E3BE68140C3AF73184EE0942B0B.description:
Assessment information and results are shared in a timely and
specific manner with teachers, administrators, students, parents,
and the community at large.

CD7B794DA50E473E9F04A50799A04655.description:
Teachers utilize a balanced assessment system that includes
formative, interim, and summative assessments to inform
instruction, monitor progress, and evaluate student learning for all
content areas and grade levels.

963AEA983F034415ACA225D9CAC5CA9C.description: The school district has a process to ensure that assessments in use are reliable, valid, and appropriate for the students being assessed.

55F9C0DD443E4DFDA0DF5776A8639D3F.description:
ASSESSMENT-- identify which response option best describes the
policies, practices, and procedures in your school or district, in relation to Assessment.

3A55A90DE9D845DAA66F909B1096C1A8.description:
The school district provides every student with classroom
instruction and expanded learning opportunities that focus on
career awareness, exploration, and preparation.

119F7FE468D647E5864CEFBBE80B6E20.description:
The school district partners with businesses and industries to
provide students with workplace experiences to identify career
opportunities in Nebraska and develop career-readiness skills.

B2289359191A49D0B2AEB20B15CB1F46.description:
The school district provides students with the opportunity to
acquire and demonstrate the knowledge, skills, actions, and
dispositions that citizens in a republic need to fulfill obligatory
civic rights and responsibilities.

E8FD554A5FBF46DAB5CB385DB76631AC.description:
The school district integrates the Nebraska Career Readiness
Standards into all content areas.

658F766550EA4DF1B32232EA98F4EAC9.description:
The school district utilizes a curriculum that is aligned to the
Nebraska Content Area Standards for all content areas. There is a
clearly defined and transparent process in place to develop, modify,
review, and select curriculum and/or instructional materials, and the
process is codified in school district policy.

EE9C6ACDD20E4DC196311B8462CB99BE.description:
COLLEGE, CAREER AND CIVIC READY-- identify which response option best describes the
policies, practices, and procedures in your school or district, in relation to College, Career, and Civic
Ready.

13B69B0A0D754CEBB552611BE3DEABFA.description:
The school district evaluates the effectiveness of new educational
programs.

7417F68622B4420793FD9B41ADFC849B.description:
The school district aligns educational opportunities to the needs of
all students.

63892AB1EB4E471A8F7C3FC8BD7B9A7C.description:
The school district has an embedded process to develop,
implement, review, and modify a Targeted Improvement Plan (TIP)
within its school improvement process.

ABBDDDFFA2CA4E11991E2322CE2120BE.description:
The school district supplements in-person classroom instruction
with digital learning opportunities for students.

5F40974B30FB4504A1590F54C984EB91.description:
The school district offers students before school or after school
opportunities for expanded learning.

C9F0E2EE117E485B89A98C9DF44185C8.description:
EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES AND ACCESS--Â  identify which response option best describes the
policies, practices, and procedures in your school or district, in relation to Educational
Opportunities and Access.

A499300A5A4346638E0C651740ADE71B.description:
The school district implements strategies to support the successful
transition of all students from elementary to middle school, from
middle to high school, and from high school to post-high school
opportunities.

12C03CFC699047928B21B76999A7B5A5.description:
The school district implements processes to help all incoming
students be prepared for elementary, middle, and high school.

A4BD4F6E9D22495CB34E005CCC4FF92B.description:
The school district follows a systematic process to identify and
support students at risk of dropping out.

622F02D774224227B1CE7389BA8BCC29.description:
The school district follows a systematic process for addressing the
educational needs of highly mobile students.

A9F2E025421D4E62AB4C24389BCFAEFB.description:
The school district follows a systematic process to support on-time
grade completion for all students.

9D9B5A7D09BD4B7F9664C5E9840FDD7F.description:
Transitions--Â  identify which response option best describes the
policies, practices, and procedures in your school or district, in relation to Transitions.

B9F14E4DD99B4294919DE5DDDFA00675.description:
The school district implements strategies to support all students
in monitoring and managing their own learning as well as meet
curriculum competencies.

EB9D1256F03047A48B36592C2FA91BDD.description:
The school district implements data-informed strategies for
measuring and addressing student engagement.

06C14CB9496A4C58A8239905EA38E768.description:
School district leadership collaboratively develop and
communicate clear expectations for a safe, clean, and healthy
learning environment with all stakeholders.

801B8693BA7C4FEA9072C824E154073D.description:
The school district implements strategies to increase family
attendance and participation at school activities.

B9F6A88DB5DE48F0969962FC8819B780.description:
The school district partners with community groups and support
services for the academic success and healthy social and emotional
development for all students.

B2C678E142B54074BD992CD47E3D0B5C.description:
Positive Partnerships, Relationships and Success--Â identify which response option best describes the
policies, practices, and procedures in your school or district, in relation to Positive Partnerships,
Relationships, and Success.
